jira_workflow_reference.overview:
Complete project online orchestrator workflow with JIRA integration defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-workflow-patterns.md
This workflow provides task discovery, assignment, and status tracking via JIRA MCP tools.
jira_workflow_reference.includes: - Workflow Entry Points (Quick Query and Explicit Task workflows) - Task Discovery and Assignment patterns - JIRA MCP Integration (jira_search, jira_get_issue, jira_update_issue, etc.) - New Feature or Enhancement Workflow Execution - Existing Feature or Enhancement Update Workflow Execution - Resume Existing Workflow Execution - Task Filtering and Prioritization via JQL - Git Workflow Integration (branch naming and commands) - User Communication (detection and progress messages) - Error Handling (API connectivity and workflow detection issues) - Automatic Status Updates (see 5_automatic_jira_status_updates.xml)
